Interactive OKLCH Color Scheme Builder

Experiment with OKLCH colors and see complete application color schemes generated in real-time

Complementary & Contrasting Colors

Tints (Lighter) - Adding White

Tints maintain the hue while decreasing chroma and increasing lightness for backgrounds, subtle accents, and hover states.

Shades (Darker) - Adding Black

Shades maintain the hue while decreasing both lightness and chroma for text, borders, and dark mode variants.

Application Color Schemes

Neutral Grays (Matching Warmth)

Warm grays that harmonize with your base color by maintaining the same hue at very low chroma.
